verses.verse: And when king <WH4428> Arad <WH6166> the Canaanite, <WH3669> which dwelt <WH3427> in the south, <WH5045> heard tell <WH8085> that <WH3588> Israel <WH3478> came <WH935> by the way <WH1870> of the spies; <WH871> then he fought <WH3898> against Israel, <WH3478> and took <WH7617> some of <WH4480> them prisoners. <WH7628>

And Israel <WH3478> vowed <WH5087> a vow <WH5088> unto the LORD, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> If <WH518> thou wilt indeed deliver <WH5414> <WH5414> <WH853> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> into my hand, <WH3027> then I will utterly destroy <WH2763> <WH853> their cities. <WH5892>

And the LORD <WH3068> hearkened <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of Israel, <WH3478> and delivered up <WH5414> <WH853> the Canaanites; <WH3669> and they utterly destroyed <WH2763> them and their cities: <WH5892> and he called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> Hormah. <WH2767>

And they journeyed <WH5265> from mount <WH2022> Hor <WH4480> <WH2023> by the way <WH1870> of the Red <WH5488> sea, <WH3220> to compass <WH5437> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Edom: <WH123> and the soul <WH5315> of the people <WH5971> was much discouraged <WH7114> because of the way. <WH1870>

And the people <WH5971> spoke <WH1696> against God, <WH430> and against Moses, <WH4872> Wherefore <WH4100> have ye brought us up <WH5927> out of Egypt <WH4480> <WH4714> to die <WH4191> in the wilderness? <WH4057> for <WH3588> there is no <WH369> bread, <WH3899> neither <WH369> is there any water; <WH4325> and our soul <WH5315> loatheth <WH6973> this light <WH7052> bread. <WH3899>

And the LORD <WH3068> sent <WH7971> <WH853> fiery <WH8314> serpents <WH5175> among the people, <WH5971> and they bit <WH5391> <WH853> the people; <WH5971> and much <WH7227> people <WH5971> of Israel <WH4480> <WH3478> died. <WH4191>

Therefore the people <WH5971> came <WH935> to <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> and said, <WH559> We have sinned, <WH2398> for <WH3588> we have spoken <WH1696> against the LORD, <WH3068> and against thee; pray <WH6419> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> that he take away <WH5493> <WH853> the serpents <WH5175> from <WH4480> <WH5921> us. And Moses <WH4872> prayed <WH6419> for <WH1157> the people. <WH5971>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Make <WH6213> thee a fiery serpent, <WH8314> and set <WH7760> it upon <WH5921> a pole: <WH5251> and it shall come to pass, <WH1961> that every one <WH3605> that is bitten, <WH5391> when he looketh upon <WH7200> it, shall live. <WH2425>

And Moses <WH4872> made <WH6213> a serpent <WH5175> of brass, <WH5178> and put <WH7760> it upon <WH5921> a pole, <WH5251> and it came to pass, <WH1961> that if <WH518> a serpent <WH5175> had bitten <WH5391> <WH853> any man, <WH376> when he beheld <WH5027> <WH413> the serpent <WH5175> of brass, <WH5178> he lived. <WH2425>
And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> set forward, <WH5265> and pitched <WH2583> in Oboth. <WH88>

And they journeyed <WH5265> from Oboth, <WH4480> <WH88> and pitched <WH2583> at Ije-abarim, <WH5863> in the wilderness <WH4057> which <WH834> is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Moab, <WH4124> toward the sunrising. <WH4480> <WH4217> <WH8121>
From thence <WH4480> <WH8033> they removed, <WH5265> and pitched <WH2583> in the valley <WH5158> of Zared. <WH2218>

From thence <WH4480> <WH8033> they removed, <WH5265> and pitched <WH2583> on the other side <WH4480> <WH5676> of Arnon, <WH769> which <WH834> is in the wilderness <WH4057> that cometh out <WH3318> of the coasts <WH4480> <WH1366> of the Amorites: <WH567> for <WH3588> Arnon <WH769> is the border <WH1366> of Moab, <WH4124> between <WH996> Moab <WH4124> and the Amorites. <WH567>

Wherefore <WH5921> <WH3651> it is said <WH559> in the book <WH5612> of the wars <WH4421> of the LORD, <WH3068> <WH853> What he did <WH2052> in the Red sea, <WH5492> and in the brooks <WH5158> of Arnon, <WH769>
And at the stream <WH793> of the brooks <WH5158> that <WH834> goeth down <WH5186> to the dwelling <WH7675> of Ar, <WH6144> and lieth <WH8172> upon the border <WH1366> of Moab. <WH4124>

And from thence <WH4480> <WH8033> they went to Beer: <WH876> that <WH1931> is the well <WH875> whereof <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto Moses, <WH4872> Gather the people together, <WH622> <WH853> <WH5971> and I will give <WH5414> them water. <WH4325>
Then <WH227> Israel <WH3478> sang <WH7891> <WH853> this <WH2063> song, <WH7892> Spring up, <WH5927> O well; <WH875> sing <WH6030> ye unto it:

The princes <WH8269> digged <WH2658> the well, <WH875> the nobles <WH5081> of the people <WH5971> digged <WH3738> it, by the direction of the lawgiver, <WH2710> with their staves. <WH4938> And from the wilderness <WH4480> <WH4057> they went to Mattanah: <WH4980>
And from Mattanah <WH4480> <WH4980> to Nahaliel: <WH5160> and from Nahaliel <WH4480> <WH5160> to Bamoth: <WH1120>

And from Bamoth <WH4480> <WH1120> in the valley, <WH1516> that <WH834> is in the country <WH7704> of Moab, <WH4124> to the top <WH7218> of Pisgah, <WH6449> which looketh <WH8259> toward <WH5921> <WH6440> Jeshimon. <WH3452>
And Israel <WH3478> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> unto <WH413> Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> saying, <WH559>

Let me pass <WH5674> through thy land: <WH776> we will not <WH3808> turn <WH5186> into the fields, <WH7704> or into the vineyards; <WH3754> we will not <WH3808> drink <WH8354> of the waters <WH4325> of the well: <WH875> but we will go along <WH1980> by the king's <WH4428> high way, <WH1870> until <WH5704> <WH834> we be past <WH5674> thy borders. <WH1366>

And Sihon <WH5511> would not <WH3808> suffer <WH5414> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> to pass <WH5674> through his border: <WH1366> but Sihon <WH5511> gathered all his people together, <WH622> <WH853> <WH3605> <WH5971> and went out <WH3318> against <WH7125> Israel <WH3478> into the wilderness: <WH4057> and he came <WH935> to Jahaz, <WH3096> and fought <WH3898> against Israel. <WH3478>

And Israel <WH3478> smote <WH5221> him with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> and possessed <WH3423> <WH853> his land <WH776> from Arnon <WH4480> <WH769> unto <WH5704> Jabbok, <WH2999> even unto <WH5704> the children <WH1121> of Ammon: <WH5983> for <WH3588> the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> was strong. <WH5794>

And Israel <WH3478> took <WH3947> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> cities: <WH5892> and Israel <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> in all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of the Amorites, <WH567> in Heshbon, <WH2809> and in all <WH3605> the villages <WH1323> thereof.

For <WH3588> Heshbon <WH2809> was the city <WH5892> of Sihon <WH5511> the king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> who <WH1931> had fought <WH3898> against the former <WH7223> king <WH4428> of Moab, <WH4124> and taken <WH3947> <WH853> all <WH3605> his land <WH776> out of his hand, <WH4480> <WH3027> even unto <WH5704> Arnon. <WH769>
Wherefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they that speak in proverbs <WH4911> say, <WH559> Come <WH935> into Heshbon, <WH2809> let the city <WH5892> of Sihon <WH5511> be built <WH1129> and prepared: <WH3559>

For <WH3588> there is a fire <WH784> gone out <WH3318> of Heshbon, <WH4480> <WH2809> a flame <WH3852> from the city <WH4480> <WH7151> of Sihon: <WH5511> it hath consumed <WH398> Ar <WH6144> of Moab, <WH4124> and the lords <WH1167> of the high places <WH1116> of Arnon. <WH769>

Woe <WH188> to thee, Moab! <WH4124> thou art undone, <WH6> O people <WH5971> of Chemosh: <WH3645> he hath given <WH5414> his sons <WH1121> that escaped, <WH6412> and his daughters, <WH1323> into captivity <WH7628> unto Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites. <WH567>

We have shot <WH3384> at them; Heshbon <WH2809> is perished <WH6> even unto <WH5704> Dibon, <WH1769> and we have laid them waste <WH8074> even unto <WH5704> Nophah, <WH5302> which <WH834> reacheth unto <WH5704> Medeba. <WH4311>
Thus Israel <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the Amorites. <WH567>

And Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to spy out <WH7270> <WH853> Jaazer, <WH3270> and they took <WH3920> the villages <WH1323> thereof, and drove out <WH3423> <WH853> the Amorites <WH567> that <WH834> were there. <WH8033>

And they turned <WH6437> and went up <WH5927> by the way <WH1870> of Bashan: <WH1316> and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> went out <WH3318> against <WH7125> them, he, <WH1931> and all <WH3605> his people, <WH5971> to the battle <WH4421> at Edrei. <WH154>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Fear <WH3372> him not: <WH408> for <WH3588> I have delivered <WH5414> him into thy hand, <WH3027> and all <WH3605> his people, <WH5971> and his land; <WH776> and thou shalt do <WH6213> to him as <WH834> thou didst <WH6213> unto Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> which <WH834> dwelt <WH3427> at Heshbon. <WH2809>

So they smote <WH5221> him, and his sons, <WH1121> and all <WH3605> his people, <WH5971> until <WH5704> there was none <WH1115> left <WH7604> him alive: <WH8300> and they possessed <WH3423> <WH853> his land. <WH776>
